Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Button
  • public abstract class Button
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Button is the parent class for numerous Greenfoot Actors that does what its name implies, it acts as a button that can be clicked to do something. Buttons will indicate when they are being hovered over by changing their images accordingly.
    Version:
    April 27, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei
